statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE sales_funnel_stage='Lead'
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, sales_funnel_stage FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id=1001
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM customer_interactions
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE sales_funnel_stage = 'Lead' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, sales_funnel_stage FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE sales_funnel_stage = 'Opportunity' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, sales_stage FROM customers WHERE sales_stage = 'Prospect';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE sales_stage = 'Qualified' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.sales_stage = 'Negotiation' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC, interaction_type DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customers c LEFT JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT funnel_stage, start_date, end_date, status FROM sales_funnel WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM customers INNER JOIN sales_funnel ON customers.customer_id = sales_funnel.customer_id WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE company = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE stage = 'Potential';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE stage = 'Prospect' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE company = 'ABC Company' AND stage = 'Lead' ORDER BY name, email;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;

SELECT customers.name, engagements.engagement_type, engagements.outcome FROM customers JOIN engagements ON customers.customer_id = engagements.customer_id WHERE customers.company = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY engagements.outcome DESC, customers.name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, datetime, type, description FROM interactions ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
